description:
Chocolatey cereal? Yes please! Not since the perfect Saturday mornings of childhood has chocolate cereal tasted this good. Granolove Brownie Crunch pairs rich 70% dark chocolate with organic Canadian oats, sunflower flower seeds, and other delicious ingredients, for a breakfast that’s high in fibre, protein, and Omega-3s. Prana Organics has found a way to make chocolate cereal a healthy option.

  • Ingredients: gluten-free oats*, cane sugar*, sunflower oil*, sunflower seeds*, 70% cocoa dark chocolate* (cocoa liquor*, cane sugar*, cocoa butter*, vanilla extract*), cocoa powder*, gluten-free oat flour*, shredded coconut*, chia seeds*, acacia gum*, sea salt, mixed tocopherols (added to preserve freshness). *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: almonds, Brazil nuts, cashews, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, walnuts, sesame, milk, soya
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Granolove Brownie Crunch
